title: Frozen (soundtrack)
summary: Frozen: Original Motion Picture Soundtrack is the soundtrack album to the 2013 Disney movie of the same name written by  Robert Lopez with lyrics by Kristen Anderson-Lopez, and 22 score pieces composed by  Christophe Beck. Notably, the soundtrack includes a critically acclaimed song "Let It Go"—film version performed by Idina Menzel; single version performed by Demi Lovato—which won the Academy Award for Best Original Song, the Grammy Award for Best Song Written for Visual Media, and the Critics' Choice Award for Best Song, and was nominated for the Golden Globe Award for Best Original Song.
